resources.string: Елемент під цим ім\'ям вже існує, змініть назву
Папка під цим ім\'ям вже існує, змініть ім\'я
Доступ до зовнішнього сховища не надано
Створити нову нотатку з цього файлу?
Нотатка буде створена в папці: NotepadJW/
Не можливо відкрити файл або вміст
Показати дату зміни нотаток та папок
Неочікуване виключення - будь ласка, надішліть мені електронний лист, що описує його
Знову відкрити нотатку, щоб побачити зміни
Завантажити та встановити Біблію на вибраній мові?
Завантажити Біблію на новій мові для Notepad JW
Будь ласка, запустіть NotepadJW зі своїх додатків, а потім поверніться до цієї операції

Notes sent from Notepad JW - notes manager and editor with live view of entered verses.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pl.bubson.notepadjw

Information

Text of all verses are from New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures (Copyright: (Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania)).

Why use NotepadJW?

This application was created, because no other app was found, which would be able to show verses in the real time while editing some note. So it is useful for making notes during meetings and congresses - you don\'t need anymore to switch applications or search paper Bible to see the verse text, it is displayed in the same window as editor. As this application is able to show all verses under links in view mode, it could be also used for speeches at the podium and other tasks during meetings. This app also has sharing option, so you can also use it for making notes during ministry and send them to other preachers.

Abilities

This application consists of two activities:
Notes Manager and Notepad Editor.
In Notes Manager you can create new notes, open them and create new folders.
You can select items by long-click and then: rename, delete or send (cut, copy and paste options will be added soon).
In Notepad Editor you can switch between Edit Mode and View Mode. In the first one, last entered verse will be displayed and in the second one you can click on links created from verses to see selected one.

Auto backup and notes location

If your device has Android 6.0 or newer: Backup your notes and settings it is carried out when:
- You have enabled the backup option on your device in Settings -> Backup
- It\'s been min. 24 hours from the last backup
- The device is idle and charging
- The device is connected to a Wi-Fi network
When the device is changed or the Notepad JW application is reinstalled, notes and settings will be automatically restored. Notes are not available for other applications or after connecting the device to a computer (this is a requirement for this functionality to work). Of course, you can still use the option of sending these files by email, instant messengers or uploading to your Google Drive. To check if the backup has been done, open Google Drive -> Menu -> Backups -> last copy -> Application data -> find Notepad JW. If there is no such item, and the above conditions have been met, you can delete and re-add your Google Account at your own risk (Note: this will clean up the current backups both correct and incorrect): Settings -> Accounts -> Google -> Delete account, then Add account -> Google.

If you have older Android than 6.0: notes are not automatically backed up. They are saved on your device in public location: Documents/NotepadJW. You can access them from our PC. It means that you can copy them to PC (as a manual backup), rename, delete, move, add new from your computer etc.

App author

Jakub Tomala.

In the next screen you will be asked about access to external storage. If you Allow, Notepad JW will save notes to external storage (in folder Documents -> NotepadJW). Thereby you would have access to these notes from other apps and from PC for your convenience (Notepad JW app does not read or modify any files outside of NotepadJW folder). If you Deny, Notepad JW will save notes to internal storage, to which other apps and your PC don\'t have access.
